1022770.name: Beyond Enemy Lines: Operation Arctic Hawk
1022770.description:
Experience Beyond Enemy Lines: Operation Arctic Hawk - Remastered Edition!

You have the freedom to choose your path! Embark on a gripping journey as a Special Agent, equipped with state-of-the-art weapons and equipment, operating in absolute secrecy as a lone wolf far beyond enemy lines.

What's New in the Remastered Edition


  • Immerse yourself in enhanced visuals that breathe new life into the world.
  • Explore entirely new gun models and animations that redefine your arsenal.
  • Reworked gunplay mechanics for a more immersive and satisfying experience.
  • Conquer challenges and unlock achievements that showcase your prowess.
  • Face off against improved AI that will test your tactical skills like never before.
  • Immerse yourself in enhanced visuals that breathe new life into the world.
  • Explore entirely new gun models and animations that redefine your arsenal.
  • Reworked gunplay mechanics for a more immersive and satisfying experience.
  • Streamlined and enhanced controls for smoother gameplay

Dive into 4 additional single missions from Beyond Enemy Lines Remastered Edition.
Your mission remains unchanged: Locate and rescue the hostage while retrieving vital information. We need names, locations, and every piece of data you can uncover!

Think strategically, infiltrate enemy territory, and complete your objective. The choice is yours - whether to go in guns blazing or adopt the silent assassin approach. Beyond Enemy Lines: Operation Arctic Hawk - Remastered Edition offers an unforgiving, intense experience where your skill and tactical decisions are paramount!

Revised Content and Enhanced Replayability

Rescue a hostage from an unknown arms dealer in an 4-mission Story Campaign with approximately 2-3 hours of gameplay. Adapt to dynamic weather conditions and harness the cover of night to your advantage. This remastered edition offers an unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter more than ever!

Beyond Enemy Lines: Operation Arctic Hawk - Remastered Edition remains a hardcore tactical shooter designed to be replayed numerous times. There are no savegames within missions, making each playthrough a true challenge. Patience and dedication are your allies in conquering this game, setting it apart from casual titles prevalent in current times. Brace yourself for a relentless test of your raw skill!
